title: Ticket #684: Port condor_hdfs daemon to Windows
description: The condor_hdfs daemon was originally developed by Faisal but was not tested on Windows. It needs to be compiled and tested to make sure it functions the same as on Linux. Any additional dependencies on Windows must also be identified.
remarks:
2009-Aug-20 14:48:22 by ziliang:
The daemon now runs on Windows, but there remains a cygwin dependency due to the hadoop JAR executables relying on certain disk utilities that are Unix specific.

2011-Jan-25 15:28:01 by ziliang:
Holes were never punched in the firewall for condor_hdfs.
